attributes.action: Ensure that funding is available for all eligable people to have Cavity Wall and Loft Insulation completed as promised.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In 2008 the Prime Minister announced more funding to enable ALL pensioners to be able to have free cavity wall/loft insulation. At the moment there is not even enough funding available to satisfy the more vulnerable members of our society. These funds need to be available now as the elderly and vulnerable are suffering from the cold
